name: Half Human
description:
IT'S TIME TO ARM UP!

    

 Its the year of our lord 2200 the COVID-39 menace still plagues the galaxy and the godking Bostossaurus-X9 still disregard the problem meanwhile all the non-vaccinated Humans are turned into zombies and struggle against the Medical staff to fight off the vaccination attempts through-all the galaxy take over the role of a zombie fighting the hoards of the Vaccinated and preserve the Zombie supremacy.

- A High Score game made in 48 Hours to Jam for All 2021!!

THE TEAM:

Gabriel Luiz Juliatti de Carvalho - Narrative and Game Designer

Kauan Fischer Cagnani - Programming

Koji Shintome(Twitter) - Character Design/Animations and Pixel Art

Lucas Faria da Silva - Programming

Renato Gimbernau Gimenez(Twitter) - Props/ Background Design and Pixel Art

SOUND SOURCE:

8 Bit Retro Funk - David Renda (INGAME BGM)

Underclocked - Eric Skiff (MENU BGM)

The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection [512 sounds]  - Juhani Junkala ( GAME SFX)
